abstract.t: Cellular IP specifies a protocol that allows routing IP datagrams toa mobile host. The protocol is intended to provide local mobility andhandoff support. It can interwork with Mobile IP [1] to provide widearea mobility support. This I-D provides performance results based onthe implementation and analysis of Cellular IP as defined by draftdraft-valko-cellularip-01.txt [2]. The evaluation is focused onhandoff performance, optimum active-state-timeout choice andscalability issues. The Cellular IP source code used for theexperimental results presented in this Internet-Draft is freelyavailable from comet.columbia.edu/cellularip.
